Name: Pandea Stones
About the game: PANDEA STONES - JOIN THE ADVENTURE ON THE SEARCH FOR THE PANDEA STONES. Pandea Stones is a 2D platform game, which takes place in the fictitious planet called Pandea. The people of Pandea possess the universeâ€™s most powerful stones, called the Pandea Stones. Five powerful stones, which other alien races would love to get their hands on. The stones have been protecting the Pandeans from interstellar threat for thousand of years, but that is about to end. In the game you play the Pandean hero, Tin, which has a mission to save his planet from alien threat. You will be facing many obstacles thru different environments, where you will meet angry robots and funny looking animals. Pandea Stones is a fun game, where you run, jump and spin thru different obstacles to reach your goal. The game is suitable for everyone and has an age-based rating of 3+.
